alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 3:57PM EDT until May 23 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Granville County in central North Carolina... North central Wake County in central North Carolina... Southern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Durham, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Creedmoor, Wake Forest, Butner, RDU International, Morrisville, Falls Lake State Rec Area, Gorman and Falls Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
